recipes.name: Raspberry Smoothie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Raspberry Cheesecake
instructions: Mix graham cracker crumbs with melted butter and press into a baking dish.
In a bowl, beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until smooth.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well.
Pour mixture over crust and bake for 40 minutes.
Let cool, then spread raspberry jam on top and garnish with fresh raspberries.
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

recipes.name: Raspberry Lemonade
instructions: Blend raspberries, lemon juice, and sugar until smooth.
Strain the mixture to remove seeds.
Mix with cold water and stir well.
Serve over ice and garnish with lemon slices.
